---

import RunInPostmanButton from '@site/src/components/RunInPostmanButton.jsx';

# Amazon Alexa Responses

<RunInPostmanButton/>

Please refer to **[response objects](https://developer.amazon.com/en-US/docs/alexa/custom-skills/request-and-response-json-reference.html#response-format)** in Amazon Alexa's documentation.

```bash
curl --include \
--request POST \
--header "Authorization: Token BOTANALYTICS_CHANNEL_TOKEN" \
--header "Content-Type: application/json"
--data "{
   'messages': [
      {
         'message': {
           
         }
      }
   ]
}" \
https://api.beta.botanalytics.co/v2/messages
```

**Field Descriptions**

- `messages` (array): An array containing messages.
  - `message` (object): Represents an individual message.

:::info 

Please note that the `message object` within `messages` array above has the Amazon Alexa's native response object format plus `request` field which is the request that response is created for and which is required for each response message object.

:::

### Example of single message payload in JSON format


```json
{
  "messages": [
    {
    	 "message": {
		    "outputSpeech":
		    {
		        "type": "SSML",
		        "ssml": "<speak>Here's your fact: A year on Mercury is just 88 days long.</speak>"
		    },
		    "shouldEndSession": false,
		    "timestamp": 1611014050053,
		    "request": {
		      "version": "1.0",
		      "session": {
		        "new": false,
		        "sessionId": "amzn1.echo-api.session.ec389df4-8963-4e1a-b7db-daf029249990",
		        "application": {
		          "applicationId": "amzn1.ask.skill.1c491832-7b2e-4247-8300-a5f6f8041df3"
		        },
		        "user": {
		          "userId": "amzn1.ask.account.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		        }
		      },
		      "context": {
		        "Extensions": {
		          "available": {}
		        },
		        "System": {
		          "application": {
		            "applicationId": "amzn1.ask.skill.1c491832-7b2e-4247-8300-a5f6f8041df3"
		          },
		          "user": {
		            "userId": "amzn1.ask.account.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		          },
		          "device": {
		            "deviceId": "amzn1.ask.device.AE3SAOAZ23RI24BCEO54JULKAGKRHXQHO7MINX5QX3NWNS7LBEC4J4XHPHWCWIL7PJJFVKC6NLV7JE26AKWVDKKBGMK42ZHU5KMAPY5QRY6AGGG5PRQOQMQNAFNOEO6UGCVPJDRHECGWAOFYCUCJFP6ERA7VI6KGDAN6HMSCA3QUVHZEMGPEC",
		            "supportedInterfaces": {}
		          },
		          "apiEndpoint": "https://api.amazonalexa.com",
		          "apiAccessToken": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjEifQ..K_1l7hD9qcYo500qaW_wyQwhzrD73eICZ_S-F4Kf4pkYoPNz_qPV62fplQA4J3uNMTAg-KZRjSDbgLu2XWhnjMO4kNod5U4aTs91qRTQ-BRksCNwMmVihcSOhuNx49cAuL2M1gW9Te8Zi6z590S0x02Xnipkm27sWyRK9-tF5ScFM347ccSbdG_SjlHT1fUuwR3pngeArdFG0ABWYUejrwX_qosRoU61MDIOGmFqIHfaFnSSyhAP5Rh0ewb6M2dcIE7U_2Ep0mIhlxMaU61gCKkFZrAqgDEQ_zBItUvFyvNm7qox-SaqsqTJmhi8rVOk119JEz0gJHtf3RM9IAKNvA",
		          "unit": {
		            "unitId": "amzn1.ask.unit.AEIRFWKIPA5SVFEVMW5XVGL5ET6CCJ7AJ5NMCTRUFXD3MIHESUD2GM5BOPDGCXDKMCA3KW65LPNTJO7SWMMOK3FUIMQYVDDKLMZV22PJMF7AYYACAS77FWH6AX6SGCFGPM"
		          }
		        }
		      },
		      "request": {
		        "type": "IntentRequest",
		        "requestId": "amzn1.echo-api.request.e0275bd3-af29-4722-add8-94f3fb7c00d4",
		        "timestamp": "2021-01-18T13:38:53Z",
		        "locale": "en-US",
		        "intent":
		        {
		          "name":"RecommendationIntent",
		          "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		          "slots":{
		            "I_Am":{
		              "name":"I_Am",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            },
		            "bloodTolerance":{
		              "name":"bloodTolerance",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            },
		            "I_Want":{
		              "name":"I_Want",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            },
		            "personality":{
		              "name":"personality",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            }
		          }
		        },
		        "dialogState": "STARTED"
		      }
		    }
		  }
    }
  ]
}
```

### Example of multiple messages payload in JSON format

```json
{
  "messages": [
    {
    	 "message": {
		    "outputSpeech":
		    {
		        "type": "SSML",
		        "ssml": "<speak>Here's your fact: A year on Mercury is just 88 days long.</speak>"
		    },
		    "shouldEndSession": false,
		    "timestamp": 1611014050053,
		    "request": {
		      "version": "1.0",
		      "session": {
		        "new": false,
		        "sessionId": "amzn1.echo-api.session.ec389df4-8963-4e1a-b7db-daf029249990",
		        "application": {
		          "applicationId": "amzn1.ask.skill.1c491832-7b2e-4247-8300-a5f6f8041df3"
		        },
		        "user": {
		          "userId": "amzn1.ask.account.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		        }
		      },
		      "context": {
		        "Extensions": {
		          "available": {}
		        },
		        "System": {
		          "application": {
		            "applicationId": "amzn1.ask.skill.1c491832-7b2e-4247-8300-a5f6f8041df3"
		          },
		          "user": {
		            "userId": "amzn1.ask.account.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		          },
		          "device": {
		            "deviceId": "amzn1.ask.device.AE3SAOAZ23RI24BCEO54JULKAGKRHXQHO7MINX5QX3NWNS7LBEC4J4XHPHWCWIL7PJJFVKC6NLV7JE26AKWVDKKBGMK42ZHU5KMAPY5QRY6AGGG5PRQOQMQNAFNOEO6UGCVPJDRHECGWAOFYCUCJFP6ERA7VI6KGDAN6HMSCA3QUVHZEMGPEC",
		            "supportedInterfaces": {}
		          },
		          "apiEndpoint": "https://api.amazonalexa.com",
		          "apiAccessToken": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjEifQ..K_1l7hD9qcYo500qaW_wyQwhzrD73eICZ_S-F4Kf4pkYoPNz_qPV62fplQA4J3uNMTAg-KZRjSDbgLu2XWhnjMO4kNod5U4aTs91qRTQ-BRksCNwMmVihcSOhuNx49cAuL2M1gW9Te8Zi6z590S0x02Xnipkm27sWyRK9-tF5ScFM347ccSbdG_SjlHT1fUuwR3pngeArdFG0ABWYUejrwX_qosRoU61MDIOGmFqIHfaFnSSyhAP5Rh0ewb6M2dcIE7U_2Ep0mIhlxMaU61gCKkFZrAqgDEQ_zBItUvFyvNm7qox-SaqsqTJmhi8rVOk119JEz0gJHtf3RM9IAKNvA",
		          "unit": {
		            "unitId": "amzn1.ask.unit.AEIRFWKIPA5SVFEVMW5XVGL5ET6CCJ7AJ5NMCTRUFXD3MIHESUD2GM5BOPDGCXDKMCA3KW65LPNTJO7SWMMOK3FUIMQYVDDKLMZV22PJMF7AYYACAS77FWH6AX6SGCFGPM"
		          }
		        }
		      },
		      "request": {
		        "type": "IntentRequest",
		        "requestId": "amzn1.echo-api.request.e0275bd3-af29-4722-add8-94f3fb7c00d4",
		        "timestamp": "2021-01-18T13:38:53Z",
		        "locale": "en-US",
		        "intent":
		        {
		          "name":"RecommendationIntent",
		          "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		          "slots":{
		            "I_Am":{
		              "name":"I_Am",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            },
		            "bloodTolerance":{
		              "name":"bloodTolerance",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            },
		            "I_Want":{
		              "name":"I_Want",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            },
		            "personality":{
		              "name":"personality",
		              "confirmationStatus":"NONE",
		              "source":"USER"
		            }
		          }
		        },
		        "dialogState": "STARTED"
		      }
		    }
		  }
    },
    {
    	"message": {
		    "outputSpeech":
		    {
		      "type": "PlainText",
		      "text": "Here's your fact: A year on Mercury is just 88 days long."
		    },
		    "shouldEndSession": false,
		    "timestamp": 1611014050053,
		    "request": {
		      "version": "1.0",
		      "session": {
		        "new": false,
		        "sessionId": "amzn1.echo-api.session.ec389df4-8963-4e1a-b7db-daf029249990",
		        "application": {
		          "applicationId": "amzn1.ask.skill.1c491832-7b2e-4247-8300-a5f6f8041df3"
		        },
		        "user": {
		          "userId": "amzn1.ask.account.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		        }
		      },
		      "context": {
		        "Extensions": {
		          "available": {}
		        },
		        "System": {
		          "application": {
		            "applicationId": "amzn1.ask.skill.1c491832-7b2e-4247-8300-a5f6f8041df3"
		          },
		          "user": {
		            "userId": "amzn1.ask.account.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		          },
		          "person": {
		            "personId": "amzn1.ask.person.AGNXEZOAZXB4GG44YZZTDHYCKGUYNH3GTBMY3L6K5FOHGFTR3V3A7ZKJ2EYAIPILK3E44XYRLIF4QW7RRHQVQJK66LYQU7CL2CB23E6WVTN2WQYLQKQSCEW3HRLU3MHR3E5ZGPLCSSDKUH34SO53IJ75IDYCNZNQV3UOZOF4IF52HRUUD2K7NU3NHAYRY5ZTAITAASDJACHZ5JA"
		          },
		          "device": {
		            "deviceId": "amzn1.ask.device.AE3SAOAZ23RI24BCEO54JULKAGKRHXQHO7MINX5QX3NWNS7LBEC4J4XHPHWCWIL7PJJFVKC6NLV7JE26AKWVDKKBGMK42ZHU5KMAPY5QRY6AGGG5PRQOQMQNAFNOEO6UGCVPJDRHECGWAOFYCUCJFP6ERA7VI6KGDAN6HMSCA3QUVHZEMGPEC",
		            "supportedInterfaces": {}
		          },
		          "apiEndpoint": "https://api.amazonalexa.com",
		          "apiAccessToken": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjEifQ..K_1l7hD9qcYo500qaW_wyQwhzrD73eICZ_S-F4Kf4pkYoPNz_qPV62fplQA4J3uNMTAg-KZRjSDbgLu2XWhnjMO4kNod5U4aTs91qRTQ-BRksCNwMmVihcSOhuNx49cAuL2M1gW9Te8Zi6z590S0x02Xnipkm27sWyRK9-tF5ScFM347ccSbdG_SjlHT1fUuwR3pngeArdFG0ABWYUejrwX_qosRoU61MDIOGmFqIHfaFnSSyhAP5Rh0ewb6M2dcIE7U_2Ep0mIhlxMaU61gCKkFZrAqgDEQ_zBItUvFyvNm7qox-SaqsqTJmhi8rVOk119JEz0gJHtf3RM9IAKNvA",
		          "unit": {
		            "unitId": "amzn1.ask.unit.AEIRFWKIPA5SVFEVMW5XVGL5ET6CCJ7AJ5NMCTRUFXD3MIHESUD2GM5BOPDGCXDKMCA3KW65LPNTJO7SWMMOK3FUIMQYVDDKLMZV22PJMF7AYYACAS77FWH6AX6SGCFGPM"
		          }
		        }
		      },
		      "request": {
		        "type": "IntentRequest",
		        "requestId": "amzn1.echo-api.request.e0275bd3-af29-4722-add8-94f3fb7c00d4",

		          "name":"RecommendationIntent",
```
